TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit DataGridCell extends System.ValueType

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell>可以结合使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>控件的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A>属性来获取或设置任何单元格的值。 设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>控件的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell>导致焦点移到由指定的单元格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell>。
## Examples 下面的示例将<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell>到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>并返回所选单元格的列和行号。 中存储的值<xref:System.Data.DataTable>也印有使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell>对象的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.RowNumber%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.ColumnNumber%2A>。
[!code-cpp[Classic DataGridCell Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataGridCell Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic DataGridCell Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataGridCell Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic DataGridCell Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataGridCell Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

Public Sub New (r As Integer, c As Integer)

remarks.format:
## Examples 下面的示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell>并将新的实例设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>控件。
[!code-cpp[Classic DataGridCell.DataGridCell Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataGridCell.DataGridCell Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic DataGridCell.DataGridCell Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataGridCell.DataGridCell Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic DataGridCell.DataGridCell Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataGridCell.DataGridCell Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int ColumnNumber { int get(); void set(int value); };

Docs.summary: 获取或设置 控件中某列的列号。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.ColumnNumber%2A>要指定的值<xref:System.Data.DataColumn>中<xref:System.Data.DataTable>与关联<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>控件。
## Examples 下面的示例将<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell>。 中存储的值<xref:System.Data.DataTable>返回通过指定<xref:System.Data.DataRow>和<xref:System.Data.DataColumn>对象通过<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.RowNumber%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.ColumnNumber%2A>属性。
[!code-cpp[Classic DataGridCell.ColumnNumber Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataGridCell.ColumnNumber Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic DataGridCell.ColumnNumber Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataGridCell.ColumnNumber Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic DataGridCell.ColumnNumber Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataGridCell.ColumnNumber Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
